\fontsize{12}{18}

```{r global_options, include=FALSE, chace=FALSE}
library(rmarkdown)
library(knitr)
### knitr chunk options ###
opts_chunk$set(
  chace      = FALSE,
  echo       = FALSE,
  warning    = FALSE,
  message    = FALSE,
  tidy       = TRUE,
  fig.path   = "Figure/",
  fig.width  = 8, 
  fig.height = 8,
  fig.retina = 1,
  dpi        = 150)
```
